pages.text: Ars Nouveau 1.10.2 SMART SQUIRRELS $(li)Carbuncles can now take from and deposit to multiple chests. $(li)Carbuncles can now filter chests by placing an Item Frame and an item or filter scroll in it.$(li)Rewrote the Carbuncle Charm section. $(li)Whelps can now use knives on blocks without crashing.$(li)Volcanic Accumulator can now use any stone type.
